column9: I absolutely loved their lunch buffe. Really price worthy (75:- adult & 65:- student) and SO tasty!! Will definitely come back!
We ordered the tacu tacu montado and ceviche and it was amazing. Also, the service was wonderful and communicative. I totally recommend this place, I'll definitely repeat.

Phenomenal food experience.

column7: Finally real Peruvian food in Lund <3
column9: As a semi-Peruvian living in Lund, I was very excited to hear about this restaurant opening, and not disappointed when I finally got to try it... I went for a special night where they were serving anticuchos (cow heart) and had a DJ playing salsa...More

column7: Good and interesting food, nice music
column9:
I strongly recommend the mixed fried seafood (jalea mixta), ceviche, and the rice dish with seafood (arroz con mariscos).

The place may not look very inviting from the outside, but it is actually pretty cosy inside.

How nice is to find a peruvian restaurant! That is what I thought when, passing by, I saw that there was this new place.
Lunch time has a buffet to "explore".
